overview:
Jung Yee joined WiLAN as Chief Technology Officer in August 2006. Jung is responsible for WiLANâ€™s research and development effort including technology and product definition, management of WiLANâ€™s internal team of doctorate level researchers as well as the management of relationships with external research organizations and international standards bodies. In addition, Jung and his research team provide technical support to WiLANâ€™s licensing and technology acquisition programs.

Prior to joining WiLAN, Jung held a number of senior development and management positions with IceFyre Semiconductor, Conexant, Philsar, Newbridge Networks, and Nortel Networks. In 2001, Jung co-founded IceFyre Semiconductor and was CTO, with responsibilities for chip architecture, standards development, and technology development. While at IceFyre, he played an integral role in developing its rich portfolio of Wi-Fi patents. Jung has extensive research and development experience in wireless systems, including Wi-Fi, WiMAX, Bluetooth, CDMA, and GSM. He has also played an integral role in IEEE 802 wireless standards development, as well as wireless spectrum policy development by Industry Canada and FCC.
